citations.citation: Pub. L. 116-94, Div. I, Title XI

para.text: Section 3014(a) of the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act (sec. 38-1853.14, D.C. Official Code) is amended by striking "through fiscal year 2019" and inserting "through fiscal year 2023".
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect on September 30, 2019.
para.codify:annotation: Section 901(b) of Title XI of Div. I of Pub. L. 116-94 provided that the amendment made by subsection (a) of section 901 shall take effect on September 30, 2019.
